Arctic stereographs of stratospheric ozone at 17.5 km (color shading, ppmv) and distributions of potential vorticity at 70 hPa (black contours, pvu) during March for years with the lowest PV/
O 3 spatial correlation (a–d) and for years with the highest PV/
O 3 spatial correlation (e–h), shown for each of the different representations of stratospheric ozone (columns). Ozone in both UKCA (a, e) and CALC‐AZ (d, h) may be altered by model dynamics at any given time step, while the distribution of ozone in SPEC‐ZM (b, f) and SPEC‐AZ (c, g) is the same every year for any given month. PV = potential vorticity.
